23-0882.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Regular Meeting held Tuesday, July 11, 2023.Page 1 of 3411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, AUGUST 8, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Supernaw, seconded by Commissioner Kerr, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Zendejas, Supernaw, Kerr, Saro, Taranto, Ricks-Oddie and AllenAbsent: 3 - Duggan, Uranga and Austin2.

23-0883.summary: Recommendation to adopt resolution authorizing the Housing Authority, or designee, to execute a contract, and any necessary documents including any necessary subsequent amendments, with HD Supply Facilities Maintenance Ltd., of Atlanta, GA, for furnishing and delivering home appliances, installation, and related services on an as-needed basis, on the same terms and conditions afforded to Maricopa County, AZ, Contract No. 16154-RFP, through Omnia Partners, Public Sector in an annual amount not to exceed $300,000, until the current contract expires on December 31, 2026, with the option to renew for as long as the Omnia Partners contract is in effect, at the discretion of the Housing Authority Executive Director.  (Citywide)Councilman Austin joined the meeting.A motion was made by Vice Chair Ricks-Oddie, seconded by Commissioner Saro, to approve recommendation and adoptResolution No. H.A. 04-23.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Zendejas, Supernaw, Kerr, Saro, Austin, Taranto, Ricks-Oddie and AllenAbsent: 2 - Duggan and UrangaEnactment No: H.A. 04-233.
